sections.purpose: To provide a constant temperature for heating laboratory samples.
sections.scope: Applicable to general heating in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Fill the bath with distilled water to the operating level.
Power ON and set the required temperature.
Allow the water to reach the set temperature.
Place the containers in the bath and close the lid.
Check the water level periodically and top up if necessary.
Turn OFF the power and unplug the unit after use.
Drain and clean the bath weekly.
precautions: Never run the heater without water.
Use distilled water to avoid scale build-up.
Wait for the water to cool before draining.
Ensure the power cord is kept dry.
Do not use for temperatures above 95Â°C.
